name: Where All Roads Lead
description: Complete by constructing your first road!

rewards.name: Naval Travel
rewards.description: Unlocks the ability to build ships to explore the open ocean.

name: The Open Sea
description: Complete by building your first ship, one fit for a real adventure!

rewards.name: Railway Travel
rewards.description: Unlocks the ability to build trains and railways to get places in speed and style!

name: Riding the Rails
description: Complete by engineering your first train and a fully functioning railway connecting two areas of your nation!

rewards.name: Air Travel
rewards.description: Unlocks the ability to build airships and soar to new heights!

name: Soaring Above
description: Complete by building your first airship. It should include some manner of propulsion (balloons, propellers, etc.), have room for passengers, and (of course) be able to fly!
